OOBFS.title: OFFSHORE OIL&GAS BUSINESS FINANCIAL SERVICE (OOBFS)
OOBFS.content: Aiolia’s financial service is based on the fund support agreement signed with JP Morgan Chase in 2014, a periodical released fund of 3.5 billion US$ for financial service provided for main American-based offshore projects.

OOPETS.title: OFFSHORE OIL&GAS PLATFORM ENGINEERING &TECHNICAL SERVICE (OOPETS)
OOPETS.content:
- geo-technical surveying intelligence service
- routine underwater operations; ROV operations; pipeline and cable as-built route survey and ditching; pipeline internal and external inspections;
- abnormal damage detection and repair; offshore structure inspection and repair; safety evaluations; casing design and maintenance.
- X-tree installation, maintenance, and flow line trying-in
- riser-less work over or light intervention
- other offshore engineering support

OOPMCS.title: OFFSHORE OIL&GAS PLATFORM MANAGEMENT CONSULTING SERVICE (OOPMCS)
OOPMCS.content: Aiolia offers a wide range of offshore oil&gas field services through several business scope, such as geophysical and surveying management, drilling work management, well services and marine support service planing. We have a unique integrated business model offering individual or packaged services that involve various phases of offshore oil&gas exploration, development and production, from geophysical surveys to drilling, well completion and to supporting oil&gas production activities, including also marine support. We are engaged to give our clients efficiency improvement and cost savings.

OPDT.title: OIL&GAS PRODUCTS DISTRIBUTION & TRADING (OPDT)
OPDT.content: Distribution and Trading business inside Aiolia is expanding in a extraordinary way from 2010, and we exceed in 2014 a trading amount of 20 thousand ton. per month, and have been one of the most important partners for Shell and BP inside US continent, meanwhile we have been opening branches from Detroit, Miami to Phoenix and Boston. The main products for trading include Fuel oil, coal tar, asphalt, oil slurry, benzene, propylene, liquefied petroleum gas, methanol, etc.

secondModule.title: SCOPE B
secondModule.text: 发发呆时声调防辐射防守打法声调

detail.content:
Founded in 1993 by Mr. Richard Henry Hernandez, Aiolia has been engaged in Oil&Gas business over two decades. We aim to create value not only for our investors but also benefits and compromise for the community where all of us are living in.

Aiolia is one of the main Oil&Gas Business consulting service supplier in US, and we have been providing consulting for many leading Oil&Gas companies of the world, such as SHELL, EXXON, BP, NIOC, PDVSA, CNPC, etc.

We prioritize the safety and reliability of our operations to protect the welfare of our workforce, local communities, and to improve the efficiency of our operations; We rigorously control our investments and work to keep a good balance of funds between shareholder distributions and investment for the future; We seek efficient ways to deliver projects on time and on budget, from planning through to day-to-day operations. Our wide-ranging project experience makes us a valued partner and enhances our ability to compete.

Choose Aiolia, choose a professional and reliable consulting for your energy future.
detail.title: AIOLIA INTERNATIONAL GROUP PRESENTATION
